name: Widdit
tag_list: monetize-website, free, add-ons, search, toolbars, applications, publishers, developers, websites, installer, keywords, content-management, monetization, k
overview:
Widdit provides publishers and developers the ability to establish an interactive online experience for their users that is personal, productive and fun through one designated platform.

Products include custom branded toolbars, unbiased in-site search add-ons, to mobile SDK, Widdit promotes publishers’ top content and features, providing significantly more exposure.

While users enjoy easier and quicker search options, publishers also benefit from comprehensive insights and analytic reports that illustrate user search habits across the web and mobile browsing activities.

Currently Widdit’ is being utilized by thousands of small, medium and large sized publishers and developers, powering millions of monthly interactions for 50+million users.

The Widdit Add-On The Widdit Add-on is a useful browser add-on that displays unbiased, independent search suggestions and tools when typing into any search box on the web.

Widdit empowers users by exposing them to better search suggestions, while also introducing alternative destinations of interest. The Add-on maintains user search habits when browsing other websites, simply making search easier and quicker, while producing improved results!

The Widdit Toolbar Widdit toolbar allows site publishers to instantly create their own branded toolbar, with a variety of customized features and applications.

Continuously deliver fresh content to your site users, keeping them excited and engaged with your product or service. Get in depth usage performance reporting and analytics to track your users search interests throughout the web.

You don’t even need to worry about creating or adapting your installer - we’ll do it for you.

Widdit reminds you to always consider these three components when it comes to maximizing a toolbar component - Search, Commerce, and Content.

Widdit for Android We’ve created an exciting experience which will increase your Android app’s engagement and usability, allow you to promote your brands and content, and significantly increase your monetization potential while keeping a cleaner experience than ever.

We’re in private beta. Contact us to join: android@widdit.com

milestones.description: Unveiling of Widdit – the fresh new re-branding of PredictAd that takes completion tools for websites and user applications to a new level of cool accessibility
